ai-tha-ap33:2.2_0: a great light free of stain.
ai-tha-ap33:2.4_0: which I got to take it.
ai-tha-ap33:3.1_0: if he receives it after receiving it;
ai-tha-ap33:6.2_0: whose lion is king of deer,
ai-tha-ap33:7.2_0: The king of gods will be kings.
ai-tha-ap33:7.3_0: Like a mixion of the four dispensations,
ai-tha-ap33:7.4_0: thinking, “There will be a wheel-turning monarch.”
ai-tha-ap33:8.2_0: a family born in this life,
ai-tha-ap33:8.4_0: The Teacher will be in the world.
ai-tha-ap33:9.3_0: Both the result of bad deeds,
ai-tha-ap33:9.4_0: and they won’t get any reply.
ai-tha-ap33:11.2_0: a meditator who loved to practice absorption.
ai-tha-ap33:12.1_0: All your disciples have been restrained,
ai-tha-ap33:12.2_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha;
ai-tha-ap33:13.1_0: Arranging my robe over one shoulder
ai-tha-ap33:13.2_0: I paid homage at the world.
ai-tha-ap33:14.1_0: The Blessed One, who has been born
ai-tha-ap33:14.4_0: and stand me to stand me.
ai-tha-ap33:15.1_0: Energy is my beast of burden,
ai-tha-ap33:15.2_0: transporting me to a place of sanctuary.
ai-tha-ap33:15.4_0: to the teaching of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap33:16.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap33:16.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap33:16.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap33:17.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kuṇḍa.
